    Enum StandardColor

    Defines the well-known standard video colors.

    Namespace: Sharpie
    Assembly: sharpie.dll
    Syntax
    [PublicAPI]
public enum StandardColor : short

    Fields

    Name Description
    Black

    The black color.
    Blue

    The blue color.
    Cyan

    The cyan color.
    Default

    The default color (fg or bg).
    Green

    The green color.
    Magenta

    The magenta color.
    Red

    The red color.
    White

    The white color.
    Yellow

    The yellow color.
